rows.text: 2013 Line U2 was extended to Aspern in 2013.
2011 Latest restoration of old line in 2011
2009 Tseung Kwan O and West Rail lines.
2007 Opening of Toulouse Metro's Line B.
2010 Opening of Riedberg stretch of the U8 and U9 lines.
2008 Extension of Line S1 to the airport.
2010 The U3 extension from Olympia-Einkaufszentrum (OEZ) to Moosach.
2011 The U3 extension from Maxfeld to Friedrich-Ebert-Platz.
1974 Parts of Line 1 and Line K1, K3 overlap with conventional railways that were built before 1974.
397 Stations served by multiple lines are counted more than once.
1966 The first underground portion was opened in 1928, but that was a tram line. One surface line has origins from 1898. System opened as a full Metro in 1966.
2012 The Red Line was expanded in 2012
2000 This was the date of the last extension to the Red Line in the rapid transit portion of Los Angeles' Metro Rail.
1868 (Elevated), First regular elevated railway service began in 1868. The first section of subway opened in 1904. 1904 (Subway) opening year
1925 While the line opened as a railroad in 1860, it was not until 1925 that rapid transit equipment would be operated here.
